SQL_STMT_U.val: select debh_no,invo_debc_no,debh_hadr_name1,btcp_valuedatepayment,bpiv_cashreportdate, bpiv_amountcurrh,invo_invoiceno,invo_invdate,invo_ainitialh,invo_scheduledate, INVO_DUEDATE from :1/bpiv,:1/btpc,:1/btcp,:1/invo,:1/debh where btpc_btch_id=btcp_btch_id and btpc_btcp_lineno=btcp_lineno and bpiv_btch_id=btpc_btch_id and bpiv_btcp_lineno=btpc_btcp_lineno and bpiv_btpc_lineno=btpc_lineno and bpiv_invo_no=invo_no and btpc_admno=:2 and btpc_clntno=:3 and btpc_debh=:4 and debh_no=btpc_debh order by btcp_valuedatepayment
